kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Browser Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Wait until Element passed is Located on page
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'play station' into text field 'XPATH:(//input[@id='mainSearchbar'])[1]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: Search a product in the search bar and verifies the product and his synonyms are matched in the product catalog.
